reviews.review: A really good game. Atte: George Washington
me gusta, pero no lo chiteros
Jogo Bom divertido e competitivo, porem com muitos haters,  mas é so mutar auhuahua
Si dudas es uno de los mejores FPS de la historia si bien no jugaba desde la versión 1.6, esta nueva versión con sus actualizaciones me llamo mucho la atención y me tiene muy entretenido actualmente.
muy bueno muchos cheters exelente xd

Been playing CS since the very first version 20 years or more back. Can remember the first map cs_mansion when everyone just want to play T because all guns can shoot through wall and people are just aimlessly blasting CT to bits. Cannot tell CT and T the difference as well since they all look the same.

And then came all the funny stuffs like "bunny hops" and when flashbang can kill people by shards (before HE was introduced). 

Good ol times and it is fun to be back.
